data.message: I would love to go on the saturday night with my Sister Emma Manning and my two bestfriends ive known since childhood Morgan White Ellie White I wont bore you with all the reasons why i deserve them because like everyone else we've all had our problems and struggles this year and pity is not something we should be looking for. We all deserve a great night out with loved ones, where we can let our hair down! #CapitalJBB #cocacola #CapitalFM
